title: The American Jewish Times Outlook
aka: The American Jewish Times, Southern Jewish Outlook
additional-notes: The June and July 1950 issues were titled 'The American Jewish Times, Southern Jewish Outlook'. All later issues through 2001 were titled 'The American Jewish Times Outlook'.  Up to sometime in the 1970s, issue titles had a hyphen between 'Times' and 'Outlook'.
We have not seen copyright notices in any issues we have checked up to 1988.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Min Zhong for copyright research on this title.
